title: Data Scientist
description: Leverage behavioural data to improve product engagement, onboarding, and retention.
requirements:
- Strong in Python, SQL, and data storytelling
- A/B testing and cohort analysis
- Data pipeline and visualization experience
- Comfortable with Amplitude, Looker, or Tableau
- MS in Statistics or related field preferred

title: Product Manager
description: Guide Jira/Confluence feature development with customer feedback loops.
requirements:
- Empathy-driven product mindset
- Agile experience in SaaS
- Strong collaboration with design and engineering
- Data literacy and experimentation focus
- Experience working with developer-centric products

title: Frontend Developer
description: Craft seamless, beautiful UIs for tools like Jira and Confluence used by millions globally.
requirements:
- Strong React + Redux knowledge
- CSS-in-JS (e.g., Emotion, styled-components)
- Component-driven development experience
- Understanding of accessibility standards
- Collaborate with design and product teams
